name: Greek Namedays Widget From Eortologio.Net
author: carrotbits

sections.description:
Full free Greek Namedays Widget from Eortologio.Net. Use it to generate Greek Namedays widgets. All widgets are customizable using a number of parameters (size, color, etc.)
The widget is lightweight, always up to date and very useful!

Check out our Demo Page with example widgets.

Eortologio.net Privacy Policy.
sections.installation:
Install From WordPress Admin Panel

From the WordPress Admin panel click on Plugins and then Add New. Search for “Greek Namedays Widget” and after finding our plugin, click on the Install button. Finally don’t forget to activate the plugin by clicking on Activate on the installed plugins list.

How To Create a new Widget?

After installing and activating the plugin, you will find a “Greek Namedays Widget” tab in the sidebar of your WP admin dashboard. Click on it and follow the instructions in order to generate as many cryptocurrency widget shortcodes as you like. Use the generated shortcodes anywhere inside your website to display the widgets.

Do you have any support email for extra questions?

Yes, feel free to contact us at theWebForm@gmail.com
